channel.title: About the Fediversity category
channel.description:
Understanding and discovering communities on this emerging social network that is the Fediverse.
This category relates to meta-systems, such as [fediverse.network ](https://fediverse.network) and [fediverse.space ](https://fediverse.space), that give an overview of the Fediverse, and provide tools to discover, monitor, and visualize our growing Fediverse and its interactions.
Topics in this category concern not the protocol itself (see #activitypub), but the network of nodes using it.
---- [Category logo](https://commons.wikimedia.org/w/index.php?curid=90896306) CC-BY-SA [Eukombos](https://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/User:Eukombos).
